title: Total S.A. 's proved reserves by region 2018
yAxis: Proved reserves in million barrels oil equivalent
summary: This chart shows the Total S.A. 's proved the of reserves they 've had .

\n It shows Europe_&_Central_Asia has had 4431 reserves , Middle_East_&_North_Africa has had the Total at 843 reserves , Americas has had 1937 , Africa has had 1668 , Asia_Pacific has had the most reserves at 12050 and Total has had 12050 reserves .
gold: This statistic shows Total S.A. 's proved reserves by geographical region in 2018 , measured in million barrels of oil equivalent . In the Americas , there was a total of approximately 1.94 billion barrels of oil equivalent in 2018 . Total S.A. is one of the world 's largest oil and gas companies .
